item.title: Plotting Geospatial Data
item.description: As useful as data is on its own, its really important for people to be able to see it. For a recent project I needed to show some World Cover images with the area of interest marked, along side the table of results. People respond better to being able to see it. This how I did that. Lets start with a list of tools we used: GeoPandas Rasterio MatPlotLib First we need to open our image data.
